topics.body: You know, whhen you think about it, Frodo got it waaaaaaaaay harder than Bilbo did. I mean he was pretty much FORCED to go on his journey. Because if he didn't he would have been murdered in the Shire by the Ringwraith. And during his adventure not only did he lose friends he ALMOST lost his sanity. The ring was consuming him. At least Bilbo chose his adventure. And poor Samwise. The only reason he stuck with Frodo is because they were bros for lyfe.

The really amazing part is that Samwise was never even slightly effected by the ring, Never once did it draw him in it didn't even bother, because it knew it had no place in a heart so devoted to his friend, Let that Settle in ancient lords, warriors of renown and Archangels barely resist it's call, but in the end the one it most needed to corrupt and utterly failed to was a humble gardener,
